steps.title: Build a "Hello world" example
steps.description:
To check that all the tools are ready, try building the `hello_world` sample.



This assumes the target board is a nRF52 development kit (with the `pca10040` board).





```

cd $ZEPHYR_BASE/samples/hello_world

mkdir build && cd build



# Use cmake to configure a Ninja-based build system:

cmake -GNinja -DBOARD=nrf52_pca10040 ..



# Now run ninja on the generated build system:

ninja

```
